titles.title: A resolution expressing continued support for the construction of the Victims of Communism Memorial.
A resolution expressing continued support for the construction of the Victims of Communism Memorial.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Expresses the Senate's continued support for the construction of the Victims of Communism Memorial.
